subSections.title: Glyph origin
Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[demand]]; to [[ask]] for (something)
# to [[demand]] to; to [[order]] to
# to [[blame]]; to [[reproach]]
# to [[interrogate]]; to [[question]] [[closely]]
# to [[punish]] by [[beating]]
# [[duty]]; [[responsibility]]
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} to put pressure on something with something heavy for a period of time
